full_summary:
================

**Government Tender Announcement**
--------------------------------

### RAM Modules / Data Storage for Research Program for the Canadian Grain Commission

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is inviting eligible vendors to submit their proposals for the provision of RAM modules and data storage solutions for the Research Program of the Canadian Grain Commission.

#### Key Details

* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00021738:T
* **Amendment Number**: 1 
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM018107/21738
* **Publication Date**: February 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 14, 2023, at 14:00
* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **End User Entities**: Shared Services Canada

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**
* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

#### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

The proposal is open to eligible vendors with a valid certification under the relevant trade agreements. Vendors must have the capacity to supply the required RAM modules and data storage solutions to the Canadian Grain Commission for the Research Program.

#### Method of Procurement

This is a competitive tender process. Eligible vendors are invited to submit their proposals.

#### Unique National Supplier Code (UNSC) and GSIN

* **UNSC**: N7025401
* **GSIN Description (English)**: Storage devices, add-in memory, EDP
* **GSIN Description (French)**: Unités de mémoire, mémoire additionnelle interne, informatique

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:
Eleanor Cesare
eleanor.cesare@ssc-spc.gc.ca
613 219-8366
613 960-6026 (Fax)

#### Attachment

View the tender package and related documents on the SSC website at the following links:

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/9BEB4002-35AF-4746-8980-EF10D9B05E78
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/B5BDB1DE-3E68-4C98-A01F-21950BC56AC9

Note: This is an expired tender announcement. Please check for any updated information regarding the procurement process.
